function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19","Impact":"High mortality rate","Mitigation":"Preventive measures like social distancing, mask-wearing, and hand hygiene","Technologies":"Thermal imaging, infrared temperature detection, monitoring technology","People":"Citizens of all countries","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Highly contagious nature of COVID-19","Impact":"Unwanted transmission and infections","Mitigation":"Quarantine, isolation, and contact tracing","Technologies":"Monitoring technology, thermal imaging, infrared temperature detection","People":"Citizens of all countries","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of vaccine and medications against COVID-19","Impact":"High mortality rate and prolonged pandemic","Mitigation":"Investment in research and development of vaccines and medications","Technologies":"Biotechnology, pharmaceutical research, medical technology","People":"Citizens of all countries","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research organizations"}]}
